000417.SZ.summary: Hefei Department Store Group Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, operates department stores in China. The company operates 26 department store shopping centers, 191 supermarkets under the Jiafu name, 26 hundred electrical appliances stores, 300 chain stores, one hundred cross-border direct sales centers under the Tesco name, 3 large agricultural product wholesale markets, and 22 standardized vegetable markets. It is also involved in the small loan business, e-commerce and cross-border direct sales, airport entry port operation, and online and offline integration, as well as domestic and foreign trade combined industrial system services. The company was founded in 1959 and is based in Hefei, China.

000419.SZ.summary: Changsha Tongcheng Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in merchandising business in China. The company operates department stores, including shopping malls, electrical appliance chains, specialty stores, and supermarkets. It also provides tourism and hotel, and pawn broking services. The company operates four hotels, including commercial, leisure vacation, and conference hotels. In addition, it is involved in property management and investment activities. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Changsha, China.

000501.SZ.long_name: Wuhan Department Store Group Co., Ltd.
000501.SZ.summary: Wuhan Department Store Group Co., Ltd. engages in the development and operation of retail industry in Hubei province, China. It operates shopping malls and supermarket chains. The company was founded in 1959 and is based in Wuhan, China.

000564.SZ.summary: Ccoop Group Co., Ltd engages in the retail, supply and marketing, financial, and logistics business in China and internationally. The company operates 14 department stores and shopping malls primarily in Xi'an, Haikou, Tianjin, Baoji, Hanzhong, Yan'an, and Eastern Gansu. It also provides asset management and investment analysis services, as well as investment risks avoidance and asset allocation solutions for high-net-worth customers; Internet banking services; petty loans; pawn-broking services; trade, logistics, and supply chain financing services for manufacturers, agents, and stores; micro financing services to individuals and businesses; and factoring services. In addition, the company operates Cloud Warehouse, which offers supply-chain services integrating storage and dispatching for domestic FMCG manufacturers, brand owners, and dealers; and Cool shop, a supermarket and convenience store that offers daily consumer goods, as well as sells products online. Further, it is involved in the operation of logistics park; member stores, cooperative shops, and franchise stores; and a supply and marketing chain. The company was formerly known as Xi'an Minsheng Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ccoop Group Co., Ltd in February 2017. Ccoop Group Co., Ltd was founded in 1959 and is based in Haikou, China.

000679.SZ.summary: Dalian Friendship (Group) Co., Ltd. operates retail department stores in China. The company also engages in the hotel management activities; and real estate development. Dalian Friendship (Group) Co., Ltd. is based in Dalian, China.

000715.SZ.long_name: Zhongxing Shenyang Commercial Building Group Co.,Ltd
000715.SZ.summary: Zhongxing Shenyang Commercial Building Group Co.,Ltd engages in the merchandise retailing business in China. The company offers cosmetics, watches, gold and jewelry, attires, shoes and leathers, telecommunication and housing, textiles, and children goods, etc. through merchandise stores. Zhongxing Shenyang Commercial Building Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1987 and is based in Shenyang, China.

000785.SZ.long_name: Easyhome New Retail Group Corporation Limited
000785.SZ.summary: Beijing Easyhome Home New Retail Chain Group Co., Ltd. is based in China.

000882.SZ.long_name: Beijing Hualian Department Store Co., Ltd
000882.SZ.summary: Beijing Hualian Department Store Co., Ltd engages in the operation and management of shopping malls. It also operates and manages theater, supermarkets, department stores, and international cooperation/brand franchises. It operates approximately 40 shopping malls in China. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 15 cinemas and 115 screens. It also provides commercial factoring services, such as trade financing, accounts receivable management, and factoring consulting; leasing and property management services; and film projection services. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Beijing, China.

002187.SZ.summary: Guangzhou Grandbuy Co., Ltd. primarily operates department stores in China. It also operates shopping and professional stores; and acts as a wholesale agent, as well as engages in online shopping business. The company is based in Guangzhou, China.

002251.SZ.long_name: Better Life Commercial Chain Share Co.,Ltd
002251.SZ.summary: Better Life Commercial Chain Share Co.,Ltd engages in retailing business in Hunan, Guangxi, Jiangxi, Sichuan, and Chongqing. It offers products and services through supermarkets, department stores, e-commerce, and other retail formats. The company was formerly known as Better Life Commercial Chain Limited Liability Company. Better Life Commercial Chain Share Co.,Ltd was founded in 1995 and is based in Xiangtan, China.

002264.SZ.summary: New Hua Du Supercenter Co.,Ltd. operates a chain of hypermarkets, supermarkets, and department stores. The company has a network of stores in Fuzhou, Xiamen, Zhangzhou, Quanzhou, Sanming, Longyan, Putian, Nanping, Ningde, Shantou, Nanchang, Zhangzhou, and Hangzhou cities. New Hua Du Supercenter Co.,Ltd. is based in Fuzhou, China.

002277.SZ.summary: Hunan Friendship&Apollo Commercial Co.,Ltd. engages in retailing and distribution businesses in China. Its operating formats include department stores, outlets, shopping malls, specialty stores, and online shopping platforms under the Friendship, Apollo, Friendship & Apollo Spring, Friendship & Apollo Outlets, and Friendship & Apollo Appliances brand names. The company's product categories comprise apparel, gold and jewelry, daily necessity, home appliance, cosmetic, and tobacco and alcohol products. It is also involved in the micro-credit and investment guarantee businesses, as well as renting properties. The company operates seven department stores, four shopping malls, and two outlets, as well as chain stores; and F&A Overseas Purchase and F&A WeChat Store online platforms. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.

002419.SZ.summary: Rainbow Digital Commercial Co., Ltd. operates a chain of department stores, shopping malls, supermarkets, and convenience stores in China. It operates 68 general merchandise stores, 81 supermarkets, and shopping centers in 8 provinces and 25 cities, as well as 156 convenience stores. The company was formerly known as Rainbow Department Store Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Rainbow Digital Commercial Co., Ltd. in 2020. Rainbow Digital Commercial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002561.SZ.summary: Shanghai Xujiahui Commercial Co., Ltd. operates retail department stores and supermarkets in China. It also operates commercial buildings. The company is based in Shanghai, China.

002697.SZ.summary: Chengdu Hongqi Chain Co.,Ltd. operates a chain of convenience stores in Sichuan Province, China. It operates approximately 2,900 stores. The company also operates a multi-functional convenience service platform. Chengdu Hongqi Chain Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Chengdu, China.

004170.KS.summary: Shinsegae Inc. operates department stores in South Korea. It operates its department stores under the Shinsegae name. The company also manufactures and retails clothing and furniture; leases real estate; and offers advisory services, as well as operates passenger terminal. As of December 31, 2019, it operates nine departmental stores. Shinsegae Inc. was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

006370.KS.summary: Daegu Department Store Co., Ltd. operates department stores in South Korea. The company was founded in 1944 and is headquartered in Daegu, South Korea.

0162.HK.summary: Century Ginwa Retail Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates department stores, a shopping mall, and supermarkets in the People's Republic of China. The company owns and operates five department stores, one shopping mall, and seven supermarkets. It also engages in the properties management activities. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

023530.KS.summary: Lotte Shopping Co., Ltd. engages in the retail operations through department stores, outlet stores, discount stores, supermarkets, health and beauty stores, specialty stores, home shopping, online malls, and convenience stores channels. The company also operates a chain of multiplex movie theaters under the Lotte Cinema brand name and engages in film production and distribution activities under the Lotte Cultureworks. In addition, it is involved in retailing of consumer electronics, e-commerce, and TV home shopping. The company was formerly known as Hyupwoo Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Lotte Shopping Co., Ltd. in November 1979. Lotte Shopping Co., Ltd. was founded in 1970 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

0244.HK.summary: The Sincere Company, Limited operates a chain of department stores in Hong Kong. The company operates four department stores, which offer fashion apparel, shoes and handbags, and sports equipment, as well as household, electrical, bedding and bath, travel, and food merchandises. It is also involved in property investment, property development, and securities trading activities; and provision of general and life insurance products. The company was founded in 1900 and is based in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong.

0312.HK.summary: Shirble Department Store Holdings (China) Limited, an investment holding company, operates department stores in the People's Republic of China. As of December 31, 2019, the company owned and operated 17 department stores, including 12 in Shenzhen; 3 in Shanwei; 1 in Meizhou City; and 1 in Changsha. It also offers property development and property development consulting, and property management services; and consulting, decoration design, and software development services. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China. Shirble Department Store Holdings (China) Limited is a subsidiary of Shirble Department Store Limited.

037710.KS.summary: Gwangju Shinsegae Co., Ltd. operates department stores under the E-Mart name in South Korea. The company was formerly known as Gwangju Shinsegae Department Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Gwangju Shinsegae Co., Ltd. in 2006. Gwangju Shinsegae Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Gwangju, South Korea.

0602.HK.summary: Jiahua Stores Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates and manages retail stores and other related businesses in the People's Republic of China. It also provides commercial factoring and supply chain financing services, as well as operates and manages a shopping mall. In addition, the company operates and manages online sale. Jiahua Stores Holdings Limited is headquartered in Kowloon, Hong Kong.

067830.KS.summary: Savezone I&C Corporation operates fashion discount stores in South Korea. It also operates convenience facilities, such as a cultural and sports centers. The company was formerly known as Uless Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Savezone I&C Corporation in 2004. Savezone I&C Corporation was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

069960.KS.summary: Hyundai Department Store Co.,Ltd operates various department stores located in Apgujeong-dong and Cheonho-dong, Gangdong District in South Korea. It also provides real estate agency services. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

0825.HK.long_name: New World Department Store China Limited
0825.HK.summary: New World Department Store China Limited, an investment holding company, owns and operates department stores in the People's Republic of China. The company is also involved in the other retail related business; property investment activities; operation of convenience stores, household goods shops, and shopping malls; and provision of catering, management, and financing services. As of June 30, 2020, it operated 22 department stores under the New World brand name in Mainland China and eight department stores and shopping malls under the Ba Li Chun Tian brand name in Shanghai with a total gross floor area of approximately 1,232,350 square meters covering 17 locations in Mainland China, including Beijing, Tianjin, Yanjiao, Yantai, Lanzhou, Xi'an, Harbin, Shenyang, Shanghai, Nanjing, Wuhan, Changsha, Zhengzhou, Chengdu, Chongqing, Kunming, and Mianyang. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong. New World Department Store China Limited is a subsidiary of New World Development Company Limited.

0831.HK.summary: Convenience Retail Asia Limited, an investment holding company, operates a chain of bakeries under the Saint Honore brand name in Hong Kong, Macau, and the Chinese Mainland. The company operates through Bakery and Developing Businesses segments. It also operates a chain of eyewear business under the Zoff brand name; pÃ¢tisserie under the Mon cher brand; and food factory. The company offers its products online. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 119 Saint Honore stores; one Mon cher store; and 11 Zoff eyewear stores. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Sha Tin, Hong Kong.

0848.HK.summary: Maoye International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates and manages department stores in the People's Republic of China. The company operates in three segments: Operation of Department Stores, Property Development, and Others. The Operation of Department Stores segment is involved in the concessionaire sales; direct sale of merchandise; and leasing of commercial properties for the operation of department stores by third parties. The Property Development segment principally develops and sells commercial and residential properties; and leases commercial properties other than for the operation of department stores. The Others segment principally operates hotels; and provides ancillary services. Maoye International Holdings Limited also operates supermarket chain stores; and provides property management and advertising services. As of December 31, 2019, it operated and managed 48 stores. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

0980.HK.summary: Lianhua Supermarket Holdings Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates supermarkets, hypermarkets, and convenience stores primarily in the eastern region of the People's Republic of China. The company operates its stores under the Century Mart, Lianhua Supermarket, Hualian Supermarket, and Lianhua Quik brands. It is also involved in the sale of merchandise to wholesalers; provision of logistic services for wholesale business; sale of products through internet; and franchise of stores. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated 3,192 stores, including 140 hypermarkets, 2,131 supermarkets, and 921 convenience stores. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

1049.HK.summary: Celestial Asia Securities Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the retail management business in the People's Republic of China. It operates through Retailing and Asset Management segments. The Retailing segment is involved in the sale of furniture, household goods, and electrical appliances through a network of chain stores primarily under the Pricerite, TMF, SECO, Pricerite Food, and Pricerite Pet brand names. The Asset Management segment provides asset management services to the fund investors. The company also provides online and traditional brokerage of securities, futures, and options, as well as life insurance, mutual funds, and mandatory provident fund products; proprietary trading of debt and equity securities and derivatives; and margin financing, money lending, investment banking, and asset management services. Celestial Asia Securities Holdings Limited is headquartered in Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong.

17LA.F.summary: Lenta PLC, together with its subsidiaries, develops and operates hypermarket and supermarket stores. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 254 hypermarkets and 139 supermarkets in 89 cities across Russia. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Saint Petersburg, Russia. Lenta PLC is a subsidiary of Severgroup LLC.

2733.T.summary: Arata Corporation engages in the wholesale of daily goods and cosmetics in Japan. The company offers health and beauty products, including cosmetics, hair and body care, and healthcare products; household detergents, such as clothing detergents, home-related cleaners, and dishwashing and kitchen detergents; home care products, including insecticides, air fresheners and deodorizers, and batteries; paper products, which include tissues, toilet paper, and disposable diapers; and home goods comprising kitchen supplies, cleaning equipment, and cooking implements. It is also involved in the wholesale of pet food and accessories, perfumed soaps, tooth pastes, food and beverages, textile products, and miscellaneous goods; and store management activities. Arata Corporation was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

2903.TW.summary: Far Eastern Department Stores, Ltd., togethwer with its subsidiaries, operates department stores, supermarkets, and hypermarkets in Taiwan and Mainland China. The company's products portfolio includes, candies, cookies, cans, entertainment appliances, hardware, furniture, decoration items, hand-made products, stationery, library appliances, CD/DVD, camera appliances, children toys, shoes/hats/raining garments, medicine/medical equipment, cigarettes/wines, rice/corns, salts, clocks/watches/glasses, fresh foods, frozen vegetables, frozen meats/fishes, dry foods, and various flavouring soures; and gold and jewelries, tape recorders, and radar CD players, as well as silk, nylon, and cotton clothes. It also imports, exports, deals, and sells beverages; vendor machines and measurement devices; and vehicles and vehicles parts, as well as repairs vehicles, and wire and wireless telecom appliances. In addition, the company engages in the product distribution and classification, and storage business; construction, leasing, and sale of commercial and residential buildings; parking lots management activities; art gallery, works, and antiques business; and advertisement activities, as well as electronic and children's entertainment playground/facility businesses. Further, it operates restaurants, food courts, and beverage stores; film developer shops; gas stations; and hair salons and beauty services, as well as offers computer and telecom instrument services. The company operates with 10 branch stores. Far Eastern Department Stores, Ltd. was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2910.TW.summary: Tonlin Department Store Co., Ltd. operates department stores in Taiwan. The company offers fashion, beauty, and lifestyle products. It also operates cafes and restaurants. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2926.TWO.summary: The Eslite Spectrum Corporation operates department stores and shopping malls in Taiwan. It also provides real estate analysis, investment planning, and operation management services. The company engages in the engineering service, catering supplies, retail store and equipment businesses; operation of retail outlets; and supply of professional kitchen/laundry equipment, hotel supplies, exquisite cuisine, wine cellars, and catering stores. Further, it operates a hotel under the Songyan ÂEslite Travel' name. The company operates 43 stores. It provides its planning, design, sales, installation, and after sales services to international tourist hotels and fast food chain stores, coffee chain stores, Chinese and Western restaurants, clubs, sky kitchens, hospitals, and staff restaurants. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan. The Eslite Spectrum Corporation is a subsidiary of The Eslite Co., Ltd.

2942.TWO.summary: Jing-Jan Retail Business Co., Ltd. owns and operates a shopping mall. The company is based in Taipei, Taiwan. Jing-Jan Retail Business Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Radium Life Technology Co., Ltd.

3099.T.summary: Isetan Mitsukoshi Holdings Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the department store business in Japan and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Department Store Business, Credit & Finance/Customer Organization Management Business, Real Estate Business, and Other Business. It is involved in the credit card, insurance, and other businesses; constructs and manages underground garages, public underground passages, and underground shopping malls; leases shops; operates restaurants; operates shares and business management, and online mall and others; commercial and corporate management consulting; and designs, constructs, operates, and leases real estate properties, as well as offers tenant leasing and building maintenance and environment production services. The company also offers employment agency, recruitment office, personnel, education and training, and labor and welfare services, as well as information systems solutions. In addition, it engages in the supermarket, retail, and specialty shops; food production; and wholesaling business, as well as operates airport style duty free shops. Further, the company plans, develops, imports, and sells gifts, novelty, and lifestyle goods; imports and wholesales western wine and spirits, foods, and miscellaneous products; and sells foodstuffs, clothing, and other daily goods. Additionally, it plans, produces, promotes, and sells commercials, video signs, TV programs, movies, plays, entertainment and fashion shows, parties, etc.; engages in advertising agency business; plans and sells travel products and conducts tours; owns and operates river cruise ships; and operates beauty and hair salons and sports clubs, and sells cosmetics. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

30M.F.summary: Myer Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates department stores in Australia. The company offers men, women, beauty, kids and babies, home, entertainment, and gift products, as well as toys, It also provides customer loyalty programs. The company operates 60 stores under the Myer brand name. Myer Holdings Limited was founded in 1900 and is based in Docklands, Australia.

3169.T.summary: Misawa & Co.,Ltd. operates and manages lifestyle shops, restaurants, and cafes in Japan. The company operates lifestyle shops under the unico and unico loom names. As of April 30, 2018, it operated 53 directly managed stores; 4 restaurants and cafes; and an online shop. The company was formerly known as Misawa Seiki Seisakusho Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Misawa & Co.,Ltd. in February 1988. Misawa & Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3368.HK.summary: Parkson Retail Group Limited operates and manages a network of department stores, shopping malls, city outlets, supermarkets, and food and beverage outlets. The company offers various brands of fashion and lifestyle related merchandise focusing on four categories, which include fashion and apparel, cosmetics and accessories, household and electrical, and groceries and perishables targeting the young and contemporary market. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 40 Parkson stores, 2 Parkson Newcore city malls, and 1 Lion mall in 28 cities in the People's Republic of China. It also provides consultancy and management, property management, and food and beverage management services, as well as consumer financing. In addition, the company operates as a licensor for the Franco brand. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China. Parkson Retail Group Limited is a subsidiary of PRG Corporation Limited.

3583.T.summary: AuBEX CORPORATION manufactures and sells nibs and medical equipment in Japan and internationally. The company offers nibs made from polyester fibers, nylon fibers, acrylic fibers, plastics, and other materials used in lighting, marking, painting, presentation, and makeup applications, as well as for PC peripherals. It also provides medical equipment and components, such as pressure infusion instruments and angiography guide wires for public and private university hospitals, and other hospitals. The company was formerly known as Tokyo hat Co., Ltd. and changed its name to AuBEX CORPORATION in 1985. AuBEX CORPORATION was founded in 1892 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3RK.F.summary: Ryohin Keikaku Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, distributes, and sells clothing, household goods, and food items under the MUJI brand. It operates cafÃ© and meal stores, campsites, and online stores. The company also designs, manufactures, and sells home furnishings, including furniture, accessories, antiques, curtains, and rugs. As of February 29, 2020, it operated 970 stores in Japan and internationally. The company also engages in the production, consultation, and design of living, retail, and other space. Ryohin Keikaku Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

3RKU.F.summary: Ryohin Keikaku Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, distributes, and sells clothing, household goods, and food items under the MUJI brand. It operates cafÃ© and meal stores, campsites, and online stores. The company also designs, manufactures, and sells home furnishings, including furniture, accessories, antiques, curtains, and rugs. As of February 29, 2020, it operated 970 stores in Japan and internationally. The company also engages in the production, consultation, and design of living, retail, and other space. Ryohin Keikaku Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

4001.SR.summary: Abdullah Al-Othaim Markets Company, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the wholesale and retail trade of food supplies and other products in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Egypt. The company imports, exports, wholesales, and retails food products, wheat, rice, meat, fish, dairy products, ghee, olive, halawa, pasta, and soft drinks, as well as fruits, vegetables, and agricultural products; livestock and household items; and ready-made clothes, sport clothes, jewelry, sewing tools, bags, leather products, decorations, dropped ceilings, and vehicles spare parts. It also establishes, operates, manages, and maintains supermarkets, commercial complexes, bakeries, and cafes; and provides catering, as well as labor services regarding house workers and employment in the public and private sectors. In addition, the company maintains training and educational, entertainment, and sports centers; offers computer services for application systems and databases; establishes agriculture projects; and undertakes general contracting, electrical and electronic, and reinforcing and carpentry works, as well as construction, maintenance, demolition, and restoration works primarily for highways, roads, streets, and bridges. Further, it is involved in the vegetables and fodder cultivation, livestock, poultry breeding, and general trading businesses; acquisition of land to construct buildings for lease or sale; and contracting of buildings. The company was formerly known as Abdullah Saleh Al-Othaim Markets Company and changed its name to Abdullah Al-Othaim Markets Company in September 2007. Abdullah Al-Othaim Markets Company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

4558.T.summary: Chukyoiyakuhin Co.,Ltd. sells pharmaceuticals and quasi-drugs, health food products, soft drinks, medical equipment, cosmetics, daily necessities, clothing, food, water, and life and non-life insurance products. The company provides its products through mail order delivery. Chukyoiyakuhin Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Handa, Japan.

4FP.F.summary: Grupo Famsa, S.A.B. de C.V., through its subsidiaries, operates in the wholesale and retail of consumer products in Mexico and the United States. It sells furniture, appliances, electronics, clothing and footwear, and other products. The company is also involved in banking operation, including the provision of deposit and loan products, as well as provides financing services. It operates a network of 379 retail stores in Mexico; and 22 retail stores in Texas and Illinois. Grupo Famsa, S.A.B. de C.V. was founded in 1970 and is based in Monterrey, Mexico.

4HP.F.summary: Isetan Mitsukoshi Holdings Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the department store business in Japan and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Department Store Business, Credit & Finance/Customer Organization Management Business, Real Estate Business, and Other Business. It is involved in the credit card, insurance, and other businesses; constructs and manages underground garages, public underground passages, and underground shopping malls; leases shops; operates restaurants; operates shares and business management, and online mall and others; commercial and corporate management consulting; and designs, constructs, operates, and leases real estate properties, as well as offers tenant leasing and building maintenance and environment production services. The company also offers employment agency, recruitment office, personnel, education and training, and labor and welfare services, as well as information systems solutions. In addition, it engages in the supermarket, retail, and specialty shops; food production; and wholesaling business, as well as operates airport style duty free shops. Further, the company plans, develops, imports, and sells gifts, novelty, and lifestyle goods; imports and wholesales western wine and spirits, foods, and miscellaneous products; and sells foodstuffs, clothing, and other daily goods. Additionally, it plans, produces, promotes, and sells commercials, video signs, TV programs, movies, plays, entertainment and fashion shows, parties, etc.; engages in advertising agency business; plans and sells travel products and conducts tours; owns and operates river cruise ships; and operates beauty and hair salons and sports clubs, and sells cosmetics. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

5903.TWO.summary: Taiwan FamilyMart Co., Ltd. operates various convenience stores in Taiwan and internationally. The company engages in the provision of warehouse tally services; electronic information services; system integrated services; sales and services of computer software and related equipment; logistics activities; manufacturing of food; and trucking, staffing, and packaging services. In addition, it wholesales and retails books and magazines, and household merchandise. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 3,548 stores in Taiwan; and 2,801 stores in China. Taiwan FamilyMart Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5904.TWO.summary: POYA International Co., Ltd. operates personal beauty and daily merchandise stores in Taiwan. The company's stores offer makeup products and cosmetics, jewelries, daily goods, snacks, fashion hosieries, hardware products, underwear and pajamas, etc. As of April 30, 2020, it has operated 239 stores. The company was formerly known as POYA Department Store Co., Ltd. and changed its name to POYA International Co., Ltd. in June 2000. POYA International Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.

5MIA.F.summary: Maoye International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates and manages department stores in the People's Republic of China. The company operates in three segments: Operation of Department Stores, Property Development, and Others. The Operation of Department Stores segment is involved in the concessionaire sales; direct sale of merchandise; and leasing of commercial properties for the operation of department stores by third parties. The Property Development segment principally develops and sells commercial and residential properties; and leases commercial properties other than for the operation of department stores. The Others segment principally operates hotels; and provides ancillary services. Maoye International Holdings Limited also operates supermarket chain stores; and provides property management and advertising services. As of December 31, 2019, it operated and managed 48 stores. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

5SR.SI.summary: Zhongmin Baihui Retail Group Ltd., an investment holding company, owns, operates, and manages a chain of department stores and supermarkets in the People's Republic of China. As of March 26, 2020, it operated 19 stores under the Zhongmin Baihui brand name comprising 16 self-owned stores and 3 managed stores with a total gross floor area of 219,100 square meters. The company provides its merchandise, lifestyle products, and customer-oriented services to middle income consumers. Zhongmin Baihui Retail Group Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Singapore.

600280.SS.long_name: Nanjing Central Emporium (Group) Stocks Co., Ltd.
600280.SS.summary: Nanjing Central Emporium (Group) Stocks Co., Ltd. operates department stores. It operates a chain of 14 department stores, as well as an e-commerce online shopping platform. The company is also involved in the development of commercial properties. The company was founded in 1936 and is based in Nanjing, China.

600327.SS.long_name: Wuxi Commercial Mansion Grand Orient Co., Ltd.
600327.SS.summary: Wuxi Commercial Mansion Grand Orient Co., Ltd. primarily engages in the sale and service of automobiles in China. The company operates 46 car stores in Wuxi and surrounding cities. It also provides car repair and maintenance services, as well as supplies automotive products. In addition, the company operates department stores, supermarkets, and restaurants; sells cooked food products to approximately 20 large and medium-sized enterprises; and offers catering services. Wuxi Commercial Mansion Grand Orient Co., Ltd. is based in Wuxi, China.

600655.SS.long_name: Shanghai Yuyuan Tourist Mart (Group) Co., Ltd.
600655.SS.summary: Shanghai Yuyuan Tourist Mart (Group) Co., Ltd. operates as a tourism and financial company in China. The company engages in designing, producing, processing, wholesaling, and retailing of gold, silver, platinum, and diamond jewelry products, as well as jadeware, arts, and crafts; engages in catering and restaurants business; operates department stores; sells hardware and electricity products, chemical raw materials and products, metal materials, and construction and decoration materials; and engages in the wholesale and retail of furniture. It also provides catering business management, corporate management, investment and asset management, social and economic consulting, large-scale event organization, and exhibition services; engages in real estate development and operation, own house leasing, property management, e-commerce activities, and import and export of various types of goods and technologies; re-export trade and offset trade activities; and consignment business. The company was founded in 1896 and is based in Shanghai, China. Shanghai Yuyuan Tourist Mart (Group) Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Fosun International Limited.

600682.SS.long_name: Nanjing Xinjiekou Department Store Co., Ltd.
600682.SS.summary: Nanjing Xinjiekou Department Store Co., Ltd. operates department stores in China. It also builds integrated hotels, and entertainment and shopping malls; and develops real estate properties. The company was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

600694.SS.summary: Dashang Co., Ltd. operates a chain of department stores, supermarkets, and electrical appliance stores in China. It is also involved in the commercial real estate business; production of wine; and hotel, film studio, and beef businesses. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Dalian, China.

600712.SS.summary: Nanning Department Store Co., Ltd. operates department stores and supermarkets in the People's Republic of China. It is also involved in e-commerce, car sales, commercial real estate, and other businesses. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Nanning, China.

600729.SS.summary: Chongqing Department Store Co.,Ltd. operates department stores in the People's Republic of China. It operates 310 outlets in Chongqing, Sichuan, Guizhou, Hubei, and other places. The company was founded in 1950 and is based in Chongqing, the People's Republic of China.

600738.SS.long_name: Lanzhou Lishang Guochao Industrial Group Co.,Ltd
600738.SS.summary: Lanzhou Lishang Guochao Industrial Group Co.,Ltd operates department stores in China. It offers various products, such as food, cosmetics, gold jewelry, clothing, shoes and hats, luggage leather goods, cultural and sports goods, household appliances, etc. The company also operates hotels and restaurants. In addition, it constructs shopping malls, hotels, and offices. The company was formerly known as Lanzhou Minbaishareholding(Group) Co.,Ltd. Lanzhou Minbai Shareholding (Group) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Lanzhou, China.

600774.SS.summary: Wuhan Hanshang Group Co.,Ltd. engages in retail business in China. It is also involved in exhibition, real estate, and tourism businesses. The company is based in Wuhan, China.

600778.SS.summary: Xinjiang Youhao(Group)Co.,Ltd operates as a commercial retail enterprise in China. It operates shopping centers, department stores, supermarkets, electric appliance stores, and gourmet dining chain. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Urumqi, China.

600785.SS.summary: Yinchuan Xinhua Commercial (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in commercial retail business in China. It operates department stores, supermarket chains, electronic chains, hypermarkets, convenience stores, etc., which offer stationery, sporting goods, office supplies, cosmetics, washing products, clothing, shoes, textiles, hardware, computer materials, household appliances, alcohol, tobacco, non-staple food, furniture, jewelry, watches, and arts and crafts. The company operates 242 stores under the Qinghai Xin Bai, Gansu Xin Bai, Xin Bai Bai Huo, Xin Bai Lian Chao, Xin Bai Electric Appliances, and Xin Bai Logistics brands located in the central business district of Ningxia and other provinces. It also engages in leasing business. The company was formerly known as Yinchuan Xinhua Department Store Co., Ltd. The company is based in Yinchuan, China. Yinchuan Xinhua Commercial (Group) Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Wu Mei Holdings Group Co., Ltd.

600814.SS.summary: Hangzhou Jiebai Group Co., Limited operates a chain of department stores in China. The company was founded in 1918 and is based in Hangzhou, China. Hangzhou Jiebai Group Co., Limited operates as a subsidiary of Hangzhou Commerce & Tourism Group Co., Ltd.

600821.SS.summary: Tianjin Quanyechang (Group) Co., Ltd. operates department stores and supermarkets in Tianjin, China. Its stores offer dresses, jackets, sweaters, tops, trousers, sweater suits for women and children. Tianjin Quanyechang (Group) Co., Ltd. is based in Tianjin, China.

600824.SS.long_name: Shanghai Yimin Commercial Group Co., Ltd.
600824.SS.summary: Shanghai Yimin Commercial Group Co., Ltd. operates department stores in China. The company also operates commercial properties; and offers quasi financial and equity investment services. Its brands include Gujin Underwear, Tianbao Longfeng, Oriental Pawn, and Xingguang Photographic. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Yimin Commercial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shanghai Yimin Commercial Group Co., Ltd. in November 2010. Shanghai Yimin Commercial Group Co., Ltd. is based in Shanghai, China.

600827.SS.summary: Shanghai Bailian (Group) Co., Ltd. owns and operates department stores, shopping malls, outlets, large stores, supermarkets, and convenience stores. It is also involved in the fields of e-commerce, logistics, consumer services, commercial investment, real estate, asset management, and electronic information, as well as trades in non-ferrous and ferrous metals, automotive, light chemical, electrical, timber, fuel, etc. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China. Shanghai Bailian (Group) Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Bailian (Group) Co., Ltd.

600828.SS.summary: Maoye Commercial Co., Ltd. operates and manages department stores in the People's Republic of China. The company also engages in property management, as well operates hotels. It operates department stores under the names Maoye Tiandi, Maoye Department Store, Renhe Spring, People's Department Store, and Vidtory. As of December 31, 2019, the company operates 22 physical retail stores. The company was founded in 1953 and is based in Chengdu, the People's Republic of China.

600857.SS.summary: Ningbo Zhongbai Co., Ltd. primarily operates department stores. It also operates dry seafood market; and provides real estate development, property leasing, property management, and related ancillary services. The company was formerly known as Hit. Shouchuang Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ningbo Zhongbai Co., Ltd. in May 2015. Ningbo Zhongbai Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Ningbo, China.

600858.SS.summary: Inzone Group Co., Ltd. operates as a retail group in China. The company offers green food, jewelry, wine, electronics, and other products through department stores, supermarkets, shopping malls, outlets, e-commerce, and other retail formats. It operates through a network of 159 retail stores in Shandong, Hebei, Henan, Jiangsu, and other places. The company is based in Jinan, China.

600859.SS.summary: Wangfujing Group Co., Ltd. engages in retailing business in China. The company promotes the chain and scale development of department stores. It operates approximately 30 stores in 22 cities. Wangfujing Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1955 and is based in Beijing, China.

600865.SS.summary: Baida Group Co.,Ltd primarily operates department stores in China. It also operates Hangzhou Hotel; and provides commercial property management services. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

600891.SS.long_name: Harbin Churin Group Jointstock Co., Ltd.
600891.SS.summary: Harbin Churin Group Jointstock Co., Ltd. engages in the commodity retailing and house leasing businesses primarily in Harbin, Heilongjiang Province, China. The company operates department stores and food stores. It distributes commodities, such as general merchandise, cosmetics, apparels, shoes and hats, gold and silver accessories, clocks and watches, textile products, toys, cultural products, household electrical appliances, photographic equipment, glass products, cigarettes and wines, and others. It is also involved in the design, production, issuing, and agent business of advertisements. Harbin Churin Group Jointstock Co., Ltd. is based in Harbin, China.

601010.SS.long_name: Wenfeng Great World Chain Development Corporation
601010.SS.summary: Wenfeng Great World Chain Development Corporation operates various department stores and supermarkets in China. It is also involved in the maintenance and installation of household appliances, home appliances, warehousing, and distribution services. Wenfeng Great World Chain Development Corporation is based in Nantong, China.

601086.SS.long_name: Gansu Guofang Industry & Trade (Group) Co., Ltd.
601086.SS.summary: Gansu Guofang Industry & Trade (Group) Co., Ltd. operates department stores in China. The company is headquartered in Lanzhou, China.

601366.SS.summary: Liqun Commercial Group Co., Ltd. operates as a commercial retail chain company in China. It operates department stores, supermarkets, convenience stores, and electrical appliances stores. The company was formerly known as Qingdao Liqun Department Store Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Liqun Commercial Group Co., Ltd. in January 2018. Liqun Commercial Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Qingdao, China.

601933.SS.summary: Yonghui Superstores Co., Ltd. operates a chain of supermarkets in China. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Fuzhou, China.

603031.SS.long_name: Anhui Andeli Department Store Co., Ltd.
603031.SS.summary: Anhui Andeli Department Store Co., Ltd. operates department stores, large stores, supermarket chains, shopping malls, and logistics and distribution centers primarily in China. It operates approximately 40 stores. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Chaohu, China.

603101.SS.long_name: Xinjiang Winka Times Department Store Co.,Ltd.
603101.SS.summary: Xinjiang Winka Times Department Store Co.,Ltd. operates department stores in China. It also operates shopping centers and supermarkets. The company is based in Urumqi, China.

603123.SS.summary: Beijing Cuiwei Tower Co., Ltd. engages in the operation of department stores in China. It also operates contemporary malls, supermarkets, and restaurants, as well as provides entertainment and other services. The company is based in Beijing, China.

603708.SS.summary: Jiajiayue Group Co., Ltd. engages in the operation of supermarkets businesses in People's Republic of China. Its products include maternal and child supplies, international beauty products, health supplies, and digital products; cosmetics, such as facial skin care beauty products, fragrances, beauty tools, and personal care products; baby products comprising maternal food products, diapers/wet wipes, baby supplies, and baby care products; water and drink, milk dairy, alcohol, tea, and coffee products; kitchen seasonings, easy to eat products, edible oils, and north and south dry goods; towels, underwear products, socks, home and bed beddings, kitchen utensils, water shaving razors, hair dryers, and small appliances; paper products, clothing cleaning products, kitchen cleaning products, and cleaning tools; and fruits/seafood products. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Weihai, the People's Republic of China. Jiajiayue Group Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Jiajiayue Holding Group Co., Ltd.

605188.SS.long_name: Jiangxi Guoguang Commercial Chains Co., Ltd.
605188.SS.summary: Jiangxi Guoguang Commercial Chains Co., Ltd. operates a chain of supermarkets and department stores in China. Its stores fresh food and food as its core category. The company has approximately 50 stores. Jiangxi Guoguang Commercial Chains Co., Ltd. is based in Ji'an, China.

7444.T.summary: Harima-Kyowa Co.,LTD. engages in the wholesale of daily necessities, cosmetics, and toiletries in Japan. It also provides logistics services for daily necessities, cosmetics, apparel, normal temperature food, bedding, pet supplies, etc. The company distributes its products to stores, including drug stores, supermarkets, and home improvement stores. In addition, it is involved in the leasing of real estate properties. Harima-Kyowa Co.,LTD. was founded in 1907 and is headquartered in Himeji, Japan.

7453.T.summary: Ryohin Keikaku Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, distributes, and sells clothing, household goods, and food items under the MUJI brand. It operates cafÃ© and meal stores, campsites, and online stores. The company also designs, manufactures, and sells home furnishings, including furniture, accessories, antiques, curtains, and rugs. As of February 29, 2020, it operated 970 stores in Japan and internationally. The company also engages in the production, consultation, and design of living, retail, and other space. Ryohin Keikaku Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

7512.T.summary: Aeon Hokkaido Corporation engages in the retail industry. It operates 78 stores. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Sapporo, Japan. Aeon Hokkaido Corporation is a subsidiary of Aeon Co., Ltd.

7601.T.summary: Poplar Co., Ltd. operates convenience stores in Japan. Its convenience stores offer pop valve, bento, rice balls, salads, noodles, bakery products, cooking breads, counter foods, and sweets. The company operates a chain of approximately 461 stores. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Hiroshima, Japan.

8217.T.summary: Okuwa Co., Ltd. operates supermarkets in Japan. Its stores offer groceries, liquor, rice, household products, upholstery, DIY, leisure goods, sports products, household appliances, cosmetics, pharmaceuticals, and clothing products. As of March 1, 2020, it operated 159 stores in Wakayama, Osaka, Nara, Mie, Hyogo, Aichi, Gifu, and Shizuoka. The company also operates in online shopping business. Okuwa Co., Ltd. was founded in 1938 and is headquartered in Wakayama, Japan.

8233.T.summary: Takashimaya Company, Limited engages in the operation of department stores. Its department stores offer an array of products, including select brand items, clothing, personal items, household goods, groceries, and miscellaneous goods. The company is involved in the development and operation of shopping centers, restaurants, and cafes; provision design and interior decoration services for retail or cultural facilities; and credit card, shopping card, advertising agency, and e-commerce fashion businesses. In addition, it provides personnel services and solutions, including dispatching personnel, outsourcing, and training; wholesale and retail of liquor; event planning services; and building maintenance services. Takashimaya Company, Limited was founded in 1831 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

8237.T.summary: Matsuya Co., Ltd. operates department stores in Ginza and Asakusa, Japan. Its department stores provide women's fashion products, cosmetics, fragrances, and watch and jewelry; men's fashion and sports products; children's wear and goods; and household goods. It also engages in mail order and related manufacturing, import/export, and wholesale businesses. Matsuya Co., Ltd. was founded in 1869 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

8242.T.summary: H2O Retailing Corporation operates department stores, supermarkets, and shopping centers in Japan. It operates through four segments: Department Store Business, Supermarket Business, Shopping Centre Business, and Other Businesses. The Department Store Business segment sells clothing, accessories, home furnishings, foods, and other products. The Supermarket Business segment operates general merchandise stores and supermarkets; and produces food products. The Shopping Centre Business segment provides rental management services for commercial facilities and building maintenance services. The Other Businesses segment engages in the hotel, remodeling, home delivery, membership management, temporary staffing, eating and drinking establishments, information processing, and other business activities. The company also manufactures and sells laver seaweed, prepared food, bread, dried foods, and furniture and furnishings; produces organic farm products; and sells apparel, toys, personal care products, uniforms, pet-accessories, furniture and interior goods, and electronic gift certificates. In addition, it engages in the planning, production management, and sale of women's apparel; data processing and systems development, book-keeping and payroll calculation, quality testing and consulting, and foreign trade activities; and management of internet shopping site, cafÃ©, company cafeteria, and restaurants. Further, the company operates salons for bridal use; and offers manpower dispatching and employment agency services. Additionally, it provides property management and development services. The company was formerly known as Hankyu Department Stores, Inc. and changed its name to H2O Retailing Corporation in October 2007. H2O Retailing Corporation was founded in 1929 and is based in Osaka, Japan.

8244.T.summary: Kintetsu Department Store Co., Ltd. operates department stores in Japan. The company was founded in 1920 and is based in Osaka, Japan. Kintetsu Department Store Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Kintetsu Group Holdings Co., Ltd.

8247.T.summary: Daiwa Co.,Ltd. operates departmental stores in Japan. It operates through Kohrinbo and Toyama stores. The company was founded in 1923 and is headquartered in Kanazawa, Japan.

8254.T.summary: Saikaya Department Store Co.,Ltd. operates department stores in Japan. The company was founded in 1872 and is headquartered in Kawasaki, Japan.

8255.T.summary: Axial Retailing Inc. operates a chain of supermarkets in Japan. It operates a network of 129 stores. The company was formerly known as Harashin Narus Holdings Co Ltd. and changed its name to Axial Retailing Inc. in October 2013. Axial Retailing Inc. was incorporated in 1967 and is headquartered in Nagaoka, Japan.

8260.T.summary: Izutsuya Co., Ltd. operates department stores in Japan. The company was founded in 1935 and is headquartered in Kitakyushu, Japan.

8267.T.summary: Aeon Co., Ltd. operates in the retail industry in Japan and internationally. It operates through General Merchandise Store (GMS) Business, Supermarket (SM) Business, Health & Wellness Business, Financial Services Business, Shopping Center Development Business, Services & Specialty Store Business, and International Business segments. The GMS Business segment operates general merchandise stores. The SM Business segment operates supermarkets, discount stores, convenience stores, and small-scale stores. The Health & Wellness Business segment operates drugstores and dispensing pharmacies. The Financial Services Business segment provides integrated financial services, including credit, banking, insurance, and e-money card services, as well as credit cards. The Shopping Center Development Business segment develops and operates shopping centers. The Services & Specialty Store Business segment offers various services, as well as operates specialty stores. The International Business segment operates general merchandise and discount stores, and supermarkets in China and the ASEAN countries. Aeon Co., Ltd. was founded in 1758 and is headquartered in Chiba, Japan.

8273.T.summary: Izumi Co., Ltd. operates a chain of stores in Japan. The company operates shopping centers under the Youme Town name; neighborhood shopping centers under the Youme Mall name; and food supermarkets under the Youme Mart name. As of February 29, 2020, it operated 197 stores, including 68 shopping centers, 117 supermarkets, 3 neighborhood shopping centers, and 9 other stores. The company was incorporated in 1942 and is headquartered in Hiroshima, Japan.

8276.T.summary: Heiwado Co.,Ltd. engages in the retailing of food, clothing, and housing related products in Japan. It operates 154 stores, including 74 stores in Shiga; 6 stores in Fukui; 7 stores in Ishikawa; 2 stores in Toyama; 18 stores in Kyoto; 21 stores in Osaka; 3 stores in Hyogo; 7 stores in Gifu; and 16 stores in Aichi. The company also operates 9 shops comprising 7 in Shigaa and 2 in Kyoto. Heiwado Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1948 and is based in Hikone, Japan.

900923.SS.summary: Shanghai Bailian (Group) Co., Ltd. owns and operates department stores, shopping malls, outlets, large stores, supermarkets, and convenience stores. It is also involved in the fields of e-commerce, logistics, consumer services, commercial investment, real estate, asset management, and electronic information, as well as trades in non-ferrous and ferrous metals, automotive, light chemical, electrical, timber, fuel, etc. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China. Shanghai Bailian (Group) Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Bailian (Group) Co., Ltd.

9829.T.long_name: Nagano Tokyu Department Store Co., Ltd.
9829.T.summary: Nagano Tokyu Department Store Co., Ltd. engages in the department stores business in Japan. The company was formerly known as Nagano Maruzen Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Nagano Tokyu Department Store Co., Ltd. in September 1970. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Nagano, Japan. Nagano Tokyu Department Store Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of TOKYU DEPARTMENT STORE CO.,LTD.

9946.T.summary: MINISTOP Co., Ltd. develops and franchises a chain of convenience stores under the MINISTOP name. The company also engages in the food manufacturing and supply business. As of October 31, 2020, it operated 5,304 stores, including 1,999 stores in Japan and 3,305 stores internationally. MINISTOP Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Chiba, Japan.

9948.T.summary: ARCS Company Limited operates eight supermarkets in Japan. The company is also involved in building maintenance, insurance, resource environment, home improvement, and travel businesses. ARCS Company Limited was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Sapporo, Japan.

9956.T.summary: Valor Holdings Co., Ltd. operates supermarkets and home centers in Japan. The company also operates drug stores, sports clubs, and pet shops. In addition, it engages in the agricultural production, food manufacturing and processing, logistics, material procurement, maintenance, and cleaning activities. Further, the company is involved in the warehousing, food wholesale, mushrooms and tomatoes cultivation and sale, miscellaneous goods and materials wholesale, renewable resources and gardening material wholesale, flower and packing materials wholesale, sale of clothing items and tennis equipment, insurance agency, and advertising agency businesses; sale of materials and tools related to internet; and ownership, development, acquisition, leasing, and operation of real estate, as well as provision of equipment maintenance and store cleaning services. As of March 31, 2021, it operated 1,226 stores. The company was incorporated in 1958 and is headquartered in Tajimi, Japan.

AONNF.summary: Aeon Co., Ltd. operates in the retail industry in Japan and internationally. It operates through General Merchandise Store (GMS) Business, Supermarket (SM) Business, Health & Wellness Business, Financial Services Business, Shopping Center Development Business, Services & Specialty Store Business, and International Business segments. The GMS Business segment operates general merchandise stores. The SM Business segment operates supermarkets, discount stores, convenience stores, and small-scale stores. The Health & Wellness Business segment operates drugstores and dispensing pharmacies. The Financial Services Business segment provides integrated financial services, including credit, banking, insurance, and e-money card services, as well as credit cards. The Shopping Center Development Business segment develops and operates shopping centers. The Services & Specialty Store Business segment offers various services, as well as operates specialty stores. The International Business segment operates general merchandise and discount stores, and supermarkets in China and the ASEAN countries. Aeon Co., Ltd. was founded in 1758 and is headquartered in Chiba, Japan.

AONNY.summary: Aeon Co., Ltd. operates in the retail industry in Japan and internationally. It operates through General Merchandise Store (GMS) Business, Supermarket (SM) Business, Health & Wellness Business, Financial Services Business, Shopping Center Development Business, Services & Specialty Store Business, and International Business segments. The GMS Business segment operates general merchandise stores. The SM Business segment operates supermarkets, discount stores, convenience stores, and small-scale stores. The Health & Wellness Business segment operates drugstores and dispensing pharmacies. The Financial Services Business segment provides integrated financial services, including credit, banking, insurance, and e-money card services, as well as credit cards. The Shopping Center Development Business segment develops and operates shopping centers. The Services & Specialty Store Business segment offers various services, as well as operates specialty stores. The International Business segment operates general merchandise and discount stores, and supermarkets in China and the ASEAN countries. Aeon Co., Ltd. was founded in 1758 and is headquartered in Chiba, Japan.

ARO.F.summary: Arcandor AG is a holding company, which through its subsidiaries, owns and operates home shopping, general merchandise, and departmental retail stores. The company operates stores under Karstadt, Alsterhaus, KaDeWe, and Oberpollinger brands; and sporting goods stores under the Karstadt sports brand, as well as an online store under the karstadt.de brand name. It also provides restaurant services under the Le Buffet brand name. In addition, the company offers mail order services through monthly catalogues and the Internet. Its online sites include quelle.de, a shopping site focusing on fashion, technology, home, and kitchen products. The company was formerly known as Karstadt Quelle Aktiengesellschaft and changed its name to Arcandor AG in July 2007. The company was founded in 1881 and is based in Essen, Germany. As of June 9, 2009, Arcandor AG is in liquidation.

AUK.AX.summary: Aumake Limited operates as a specialist retailer in Australia and New Zealand. It offers healthcare supplements and food; skin and body care products, and cosmetics; dairy products and baby food, including infant formula; and wool and leather products to Chinese consumers through its stores. It operates 15 stores, including 5 stores under the AuMake name; 8 stores under the Broadway name; and 2 stores under the Kiwi-Buy name. The company also operates online e-commerce stores. Aumake Limited is based in Sydney, Australia.

AVK1.F.summary: AEON Stores (Hong Kong) Co., Limited operates general merchandise stores (GMS). The company offers a range of daily necessity merchandise, such as food, fashion, household items, and electrical appliances; kitchen utensils, stationery, glassware, home decoration, beauty and personal care products, and other products; food and beverages; bread, pastries, and other food delicacies; cosmetics, skin care, and personal care products, as well as drugs and healthy food products; and amusement rides. The company also operates AEONCITY, an online shopping store. It operates 9 GMS, 2 independent supermarkets, 57 independent Living PLAZA, 3 Bento Express, and 3 Mono Mono store in Hong Kong; and 23 GMS, 10 independent supermarkets, and 1 shopping centers in Guangdong Province, the People's Republic of China. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong. AEON Stores (Hong Kong) Co., Limited is a subsidiary of AEON Co., Ltd.

BGP.NZ.summary: Briscoe Group Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the retail of homeware and sporting goods in New Zealand. The company operates through two segments, Homeware and Sporting Goods. It operates 88 retail stores, including 46 stores under the Briscoes Homeware brand; 1 store under the Living & Giving brand; and 41 stores under the Rebel Sport brand. It also sells products online. The company was founded in 1781 and is headquartered in Auckland, New Zealand. Briscoe Group Limited is a subsidiary of JB Were (NZ) Nominees Limited.

BIZIM.IS.summary: Bizim Toptan Satis Magazalari A.S. wholesales and retails of fast moving consumer goods in Turkey. The company offers dry food, delicatessen and breakfast products; paper products; home supplies and care products, hand tools, communication, meat and meat products, milk and dairy products, fruits and vegetables, beverages, cosmetics and personal care products, cleaning products, electronic and electrical appliances, energy and lighting, office and stationery, and snacks and bakery products to wholesalers, merchants, grocers, markets, supermarkets, specialized retailers, hotels, restaurants, and cafes, as well as to tax payers and legal entities, such as small dealers, small markets, canteens, catering companies, corporate customers, and industrial and public organizations. It wholesales approximately 7000 product types consisting of branded and private label products. The company sells its product through Bizimtoptan.com.tr, a digital sales platform. As of March 31, 2019, it had 175 stores in 69 cities; and 801 franchise shops. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Bizim Toptan Satis Magazalari A.S. is a subsidiary of Yildiz Holding A.S.

BONTQ.summary: The Bon-Ton Stores, Inc. operates department stores in the United States. The company's stores offer various brand-name fashion apparel and accessories for women, men, and children, as well as cosmetics, home furnishings, and other goods. As of November 30, 2017, it operated 260 stores, including 9 furniture galleries and 4 clearance centers in 24 states in the Northeast, Midwest, and upper Great Plains under the Bon-Ton, Bergner's, Boston Store, Carson's, ElderBeerman, Herberger's, and Younkers names. The company was founded in 1898 and is headquartered in York, Pennsylvania.

CE0.F.summary: Celestial Asia Securities Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the retail management business in the People's Republic of China. It operates through Retailing and Asset Management segments. The Retailing segment is involved in the sale of furniture, household goods, and electrical appliances through a network of chain stores primarily under the Pricerite, TMF, SECO, Pricerite Food, and Pricerite Pet brand names. The Asset Management segment provides asset management services to the fund investors. The company also provides online and traditional brokerage of securities, futures, and options, as well as life insurance, mutual funds, and mandatory provident fund products; proprietary trading of debt and equity securities and derivatives; and margin financing, money lending, investment banking, and asset management services. Celestial Asia Securities Holdings Limited is headquartered in Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong.

CENCOSUD.SN.summary: Cencosud S.A., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a multi-brand retailer in Chile, Argentina, Brazil, Colombia, and Peru. The company operates supermarkets, home improvement stores, department stores, shopping centers, and insurance brokerage and family entertainment centers; and provides private label credit cards, consumer loans, and limited financial services to its retail customers, as well as offers commercial real estate development services. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 1,108 stores and 67 shopping centers covering 3.5 million square meters of sales area; and 830 thousand square meters of rentable areas to third parties. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Las Condes, Chile.

CGRA3.SA.summary: Grazziotin S.A. engages in the retail business in Brazil. The company's stores offer footwear, sport products, beds, tables, bath and intimate line products, furniture, housing and bazaar items, watches, jewelries, perfumery and camping, construction and electrical materials, sanitary and hardware products, hunting and fishing items, and painting and fodder products, as well as clothing products for men, women, and children. It also engages in the growing and extraction of woods, as well as manages shopping centers. The company was founded in 1950 and is based in Passo Fundo, Brazil.
